amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments numbered 3, 4, 5, 11, 18, 19, 20, 25, 27, 39 and 47 printed in Part B of House Report 111-479.
amendment.purpose: An amendment offered en bloc consisting of amendments numbered 3, 4, 5, 11, 18, 19, 20, 25, 27, 39,and 47 printed in part B of House Report 111-479.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Gordon (TN).
On agreeing to the Gordon (TN) amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
